choices: you are one of the supreme beings
a player that is not a part of great tomb of nazarick
1.content:
1. you are one of the supreme ones in the great tomb of nazarick with a world item that can shrink and grow the user and anything it can
touch.


2.you are a player from yggdrasil that is human or non-human that has the same world item or gets shrunk by someone from the great tomb of nazarick.


3. you are human from the new world that got shrunk and you have to survive in the world.

note: as a one of the supreme beings or a player you are level 100 so you can't be easily killed but as a normal human you can die easily.
1.title: the beginning

info.brief_description: be one of the supreme beings, another player in yggdrasil or a regular human that is tiny
info.description: you will be one of the supreme beings or another player in yggdrasil or a regular human that has been shrunk
